areas.name: Muizenberg Beach
areas.description: A popular beach known for its colorful beach huts, surfing, and vibrant atmosphere. Perfect for families and water sports enthusiasts.

areas.name: Civic Hall
areas.addresses: Civic Centre, Cape Town, South Africa
areas.description: A historic venue in Cape Town, hosting cultural events, exhibitions, and community gatherings.

areas.name: Bo-Kaap
areas.description: A historic neighborhood known for its brightly colored houses and rich Cape Malay culture. A must-visit for history and photography enthusiasts.

areas.name: Century City
areas.addresses: Century City, Cape Town, South Africa
areas.description: A modern urban hub featuring shopping centers, entertainment venues, and scenic canals.

areas.name: Sea Point
areas.addresses: Sea Point, Cape Town, South Africa
areas.description: A vibrant seaside suburb with a popular promenade, offering stunning ocean views and recreational activities.

areas.name: Table Mountain
areas.addresses: Table Mountain, Cape Town, South Africa
areas.description: One of the New Seven Wonders of Nature, Table Mountain offers breathtaking views of Cape Town and is a haven for hikers and nature lovers.
